name: Princess Erch 尔茄公主
description:
Pixel style Rouge adventure game, players control Erch princess, facing challenges again and again, becoming stronger and stronger.
The dead prince returned to the world with hatred and wanted to sprinkle his anger on the world. Princess Erch will embark on a fantasy adventure. She will defeat the prince's hatred and save her friends.

Game features:

Choice of fate

Simple words outline the direction of fate!

Battle！

Continuously improve in battle!

Multiple skills

Multiple skill collocation!
